description: Manage your device privacy based on lock/unlock state Privacy Flip automatically manages your device's privacy features based on screen lock/unlock state. When you lock your device, it disables Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, mobile data, location services, and NFC. When you unlock, it intelligently restores the features you want back on. Features: • Manage your device privacy based on lock/unlock state • Configurable feature control (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Mobile Data, Location, NFC) • Customizable timing delays (0-60 seconds for both lock and unlock) • Background service for persistent monitoring • Quick Settings tile integration • Traditional Android Views with clean, efficient UI • Comprehensive logging and debugging Privacy Features Controlled: • Wi-Fi - Disable/enable wireless connectivity • Bluetooth - Control Bluetooth radio • Mobile data - Manage cellular data connection • Location services - Control GPS and location tracking • NFC - Control NFC sensor Requirements: • Root access (Magisk, SuperSU, or similar) • Android 5.0+ (API level 21) The app requires root permissions to control system-level privacy features. All privacy actions are performed locally on the device with no data transmission. Privacy & Security: • Zero telemetry - No data sent to external servers • Local storage only - All settings stored on device • No network permissions - App cannot access internet • Open source - Full code transparency Usage: 1. Open PrivacyFlip and grant root permissions 2. Configure your preferred privacy settings 3. Set lock/unlock delays if desired 4. The app works automatically in the background Once configured, PrivacyFlip works automatically: • Lock your device → Selected features will be disabled • Unlock your device → Selected features will be restored F-Droid Compliance: • Zero Google dependencies - Pure AndroidX implementation • No tracking or telemetry - Complete privacy focus • Traditional Android Views - No Material Design dependencies • Open source transparency - Full code audit available
